CustomField.description: 2020-04-13 MDM: For Refugees program. The monthly amount to be provided to the newcomer family throughout the duration of their 12 month settlement period. Monthly RAP rates are determined by IRCC's RAP calculator.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The monthly amount to be provided to the newcomer family throughout the duration of their 12 month settlement period. Monthly RAP rates are determined by IRCC's RAP calculator.
CustomField.label: Monthly RAP Rates
